Messages.Content:
“Referenced script (Unknown) is missing” keeps coming back

If missing scripts reappear after saving the scene, that almost always means the missing script lives on a prefab that gets instantiated at runtime (DebugCube / PureDOTS bootstrap GO / CameraRig), not the scene instance we edited.

Action:

Locate the prefabs for:

Debug cube

PureDOTS bootstrap object (whatever is being spawned/ensured)

Camera rig

Open each prefab in Prefab Mode

Run Remove Missing Scripts

Save prefab(s)

Also check any Resources/ prefabs, because the log shows camera rig spawns “from Resources” in prior runs, which is the usual source of “it regenerates”.

Arguments.task_progress:
- [ ] Locate prefabs for DebugCube, PureDOTS Bootstrap, and CameraRig
- [ ] Check and remove missing scripts from DebugCube prefab
- [ ] Check and remove missing scripts from PureDOTS Bootstrap prefab
- [ ] Check and remove missing scripts from CameraRig prefab
- [ ] Verify no more missing scripts in these prefabs
